ai-ya9.2.3:163.1_1: and unskillful qualities arise in them: cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:164.1_0: what is skillful and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:165.1_0: But they don’t cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:166.1_0: They haven’t ceased, and rejected unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:167.1_0: But if they haven’t ceased, what skillful qualities cease without anything left over, these things do not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:168.1_0: They haven’t arisen unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:169.1_0: But if they haven’t ceased, what unskillful qualities do not arise in them do not arise for them:
ai-ya9.2.3:170.1_0: Where skillful qualities arise or unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:171.0_0: Talking for him, he is honoured by individuals,
ai-ya9.2.3:171.1_0: Whoever has no unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, wherever they cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:172.1_0: They all give rise to the thought of the mind. They haven’t given up that. They’re not skilled in that. And those qualities do not arise there.
ai-ya9.2.3:172.1_1: ‘When the mind is pure, unskillful qualities arise and skillful qualities do not arise. Your mind do not arise.’
ai-ya9.2.3:173.1_0: And wherever these unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, the skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:174.1_0: They don’t arise in whatever qualities they’re not inappropriate or repeared.
ai-ya9.2.3:175.1_0: They all do not arise in the course of the mind. They haven’t specifically profitable thoughts. They don’t arise where these things don’t arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:175.1_1: arise in them, they don’t arise and cease in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:176.1_0: And wherever they haven’t arisen cease without anything left over, the skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:177.1_0: wherever these things don’t arise in them, and wherever they don’t arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:178.1_0: They all give rise to the thought of the mind. They haven’t given up those unskillful qualities. They’re not independent, not unskilled in that. And where these things don’t arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:178.1_1: For those who are pure, unskillful qualities do not arise in them, and these things do not arise when they’re not specifically cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:179.1_0: But if they don’t cease without anything left over, these things do not arise wherever they do not arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:180.0.1_0: for the future is fitted, and exhausted.
ai-ya9.2.3:180.1_0: and skillful qualities cease when they cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:181.1_0: When the origin of the path is born in between the path, you’ll give rise to the highest thoughts. Though this kind of thought, unskillful qualities arise and not in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:181.1_1: ‘When these skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities cease.’
ai-ya9.2.3:182.1_0: But if they do cease when they cease, and skillful qualities cease when they do arise, then:
ai-ya9.2.3:183.1_0: ‘All the minds of this territory, their skillful qualities arise in the calm. They’ll give rise to unarisen skillful qualities, and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.’
ai-ya9.2.3:183.1_1: When skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:184.1_0: and skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:185.1_0: When they haven’t ceased, if they do arise and skillful qualities that arise, then:
ai-ya9.2.3:186.1_0: ‘All the minds of this terrified mind and body are unprofitable in mind. They’ll give rise to unarisen skillful qualities, and not unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:186.1_1: When skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, and skillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:187.1_0: and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:188.1_0: and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:189.1_0: ‘All the minds of the Saṅgha’s mind will arise in the ending of defilements. They’ll give rise to unprofitable thoughts. They’re not doing anything unskillful.
ai-ya9.2.3:189.1_1: When unskillful qualities arise and cease without anything left over, and unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:190.1_0: Where skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.’
ai-ya9.2.3:191.1_0: and skillful qualities arise and where they cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:192.1_0: This is the origin of the path, when the mind is interpretation, you’ll give rise to the best thoughts, and thoughts that are skillful and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:192.1_1: That’s how these skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities decline.
ai-ya9.2.3:193.1_0: And wherever they cease, unskillful qualities arise and skillful qualities decline.
ai-ya9.2.3:194.1_0: ‘All these qualities arise in the course of a mind of the skillful, but skillful qualities arise in that way, they will not give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:194.1_1: and skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities decline.
ai-ya9.2.3:195.1_0: and skillful qualities arise without them.
ai-ya9.2.3:196.1_0: and discomfort and cease without anything left over, wherever they arise and wherever they arise,
ai-ya9.2.3:197.1_0: ‘All the minds of the one whose mind is fearful, skillful qualities arise in them, and blamelessly, not in that place. They’ll give rise to unarisen skillful qualities, but do not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:197.1_1: When giving rise to skillful qualities arise and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, and skillful qualities arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:198.1_0: Wherever unskillful qualities arise and where they cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:199.1_0: and wherever they arise and wherever they cease without it?
ai-ya9.2.3:200.1_0: ‘All the minds of the Saṅgha’, unskillful qualities arise in the moment of the mind. They’ll give rise to unprofitable thoughts. But these things don’t arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:200.1_1: When those things arise, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, and unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:201.1_0: They’re not skillful qualities, and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:202.1_0: ‘All the minds of this terrified mind and body are unprofitable in mind. They’re not skilled in discriminations. They don’t give rise to unskillful qualities, and skillful qualities cease without anything left over.’
ai-ya9.2.3:202.1_1: If they’re traveling along the road, influence of the perfected ones, they willn’t get a different path, the unskillful qualities of them. So when they don’t arise, they’ll give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:203.1_0: But if they don’t cease without anything left over, these things do not arise or cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:204.1_0: This is the origin of the path, which gives rise to the thought, transmigration in between the paths, the mind, and thoughts don’t arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:204.1_1: If they don’t, influence of the path of the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddha, they’ll give rise to unprofitable things. But when they don’t arise, these skillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:205.1_0: They’ll have no indeed left unprofitable things and not arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:206.1_0: ‘All the minds of this territory, their skillful qualities cease without anything left over. They won’t give rise to unarisen skillful qualities, and do not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:206.1_1: When the last body and mind are unprofitable, skillful qualities arise or cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:207.1_0: But if they don’t cease without anything left over, the skillful qualities do not arise or cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:208.1_0: They’ll have no unskillful qualities that arise or cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:209.1_0: It is all these things that give rise to unprofitable mind. They’re not skilled in discriminations. They’ll give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:209.1_1: When the last body and mind are discarded, unskillful qualities do not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:210.1_0: But if they don’t cease without anything left over, these things do not arise when they do not arise,
ai-ya9.2.3:211.1_0: Where skillful qualities cease without anything left over.’
ai-ya9.2.3:212.0_0: Talking for him, he is honoured by individuals,
ai-ya9.2.3:212.1_0: Whoever has no unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:213.1_0: ‘All these qualities arise in the course of a mind of the skillful, but not so, unskillful qualities do not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:213.1_1: If they don’t, influence of the path of the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddha, they’ll give rise to unfitable things. Though they don’t lose their minds, unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:214.1_0: And wherever these unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, the skillful qualities do not arise and skillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:215.1_0: They’ll give rise to the best of the variety of paths, the intentions, the thought, “This way of mind, and thoughts don’t arise in them. However unskillful qualities do not arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:215.1_1: If they don’t, influence of the path of the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddha, they’ll give rise to unfitable things. Though their minds don’t arise in them, they’ll give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:216.1_0: and skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:217.1_0: They all do not arise in the course of the mind. They’ll give rise to skillful qualities that do not arise when they haven’t yet arisen. They won’t give rise to these things.
ai-ya9.2.3:217.1_1: When the last blessing is unprofitable, skillful qualities arise and cease without anything left over,
ai-ya9.2.3:218.1_0: And wherever they haven’t ceased, and skillful qualities cease without anything left over, those thoughts do not arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:219.1_0: Wherever unskillful qualities arise and not cease without anything left over, they will not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:220.1_0: ‘All these qualities arise in the motion of the mind, unprofitable mind, unskilled in the unprofitable mind, not unshakable. They won’t give rise to unskillful qualities.’
ai-ya9.2.3:220.1_1: When the last body and mind are discarded, unskillful qualities do not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:221.1_0: But if they don’t cease without anything left over, these things do not arise where they do not arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:222.1_0: ‘The unskillful qualities that arise and wherever they cease.’
ai-ya9.2.3:223.1_0: If they were the origin of the path, the result of the perfected ones, of the path and of something connected with the best, they will not arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:223.1_1: ‘Unskillful qualities cease in this way and where skillful qualities cease.’
ai-ya9.2.3:224.1_0: Or if they cease when they have ceased, what are skillful and unskillful qualities cease in them?
ai-ya9.2.3:225.1_0: They’ll arise in him whomever he has ceased.
ai-ya9.2.3:226.1_0: When the last bunch of the Commentaries have ceased, they will arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:226.1_1: ‘Their skillful qualities arise and cease without anything left over.’
ai-ya9.2.3:227.1_0: When they have no inconsequential thoughts cease without anything left over, the skillful and the unskillful qualities cease.
ai-ya9.2.3:228.1_0: They’ll have ceased there in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:229.1_0: When the last blessing with a mind is broken, unskillful qualities arise and not unfit for them.
ai-ya9.2.3:229.1_1: ‘The unskillful qualities arise and settle down on this matter.
ai-ya9.2.3:230.1_0: When they have no inconsequences, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, what is unprofitable and expelled.
ai-ya9.2.3:231.1_0: where skillful qualities arise and wherever they cease. ...
ai-ya9.2.3:232.1_0: and skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:233.1_0: the origin of the path of the Aṅguttara, the highest of the perfected ones will arise in that place. However, these unskillful qualities will arise in them?
ai-ya9.2.3:234.1_0: Or else they’re included in whatever qualities the skillful qualities that are skillful and unskillful,
ai-ya9.2.3:235.1_0: ‘When the mind is pure, unskillful qualities are found, and skillful, then those qualities will arise and there.’
ai-ya9.2.3:236.1_0: Here skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:237.1_0: ‘On the last bign of the unprofitable states will arise in them, and not in that place.
ai-ya9.2.3:238.1_0: Or if they’re not included inconsequences where these skillful qualities cease without anything left over, the skillful and the unskillful qualities arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:239.1_0: On the second occasion they’re kept ignorant and unskillful qualities will arise in them. They’ll give rise to those qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:240.1_0: Here unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.”
ai-ya9.2.3:241.1_0: ‘Of the last of the teacher’s mind, unskillful qualities will arise there, and there will be no more.
ai-ya9.2.3:241.1_1: do so, unskillful qualities arise and them: they will arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:242.1_0: Or if they cease without anything left over, the unskillful qualities that arise and where there are no unskillful qualities:
ai-ya9.2.3:243.1_0: On the second occasion they’re kept ignorant and unskillful qualities will arise in them. Only then, those qualities will not arise there.
ai-ya9.2.3:243.1_1: doing so, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:244.1_0: One who has not arisen skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:245.1_0: Or if they haven’t ceased, there are no unskillful qualities that would arise in them:
ai-ya9.2.3:246.1_0: They haven’t arisen skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:247.1_0: Or if they haven’t specifically ceased, and skillful qualities arise in them, they’ll arise in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:248.1_0: They haven’t arisen unskillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:249.1_0: Or if they haven’t ceased, and unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, the unskillful qualities will arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:250.1_0: Where skillful qualities cease without anything left over.’ ...
ai-ya9.2.3:251.0_0: Talking for him, he is honoured by individuals,
ai-ya9.2.3:251.1_0: One who has not arisen skillful qualities cease without anything left over.
ai-ya9.2.3:252.1_0: On the second occasion they’re not pure; those unskillful qualities aren’t found in them. They don’t give rise to those unskillful qualities.
ai-ya9.2.3:252.1_1: ‘Owing to those skillful qualities will arise and where they will not arise.’
ai-ya9.2.3:253.1_0: And wherever these unskillful qualities cease without anything left over, the skillful qualities may be found:
ai-ya9.2.3:254.1_0: If they’re the origin of the path, influence of the path, they’re not able to obtain the highest act, and unskillful qualities of them will arise there, they won’t arise there.
ai-ya9.2.3:254.1_1: ‘One bad, unskillful qualities aren’t found: these things will arise and skillful qualities that arise because of this.’
ai-ya9.2.3:255.1_0: They don’t arise in where these things aren’t found, and wherever they haven’t ceased.
ai-ya9.2.3:256.1_0: Or else they’re not included inconsequences where these skillful qualities cease without anything left over, the skillful qualities aren’t arise.
ai-ya9.2.3:257.1_0: They’ll haven’t arisen unskillful qualities that are not found in them.
ai-ya9.2.3:258.1_0: Or if they don’t cease without anything left over, there are no unskillful qualities that would arise in him.
